name: places/ChIJ0VryPaJZwokRCOQP56EnI5U
adrFormatAddress: 872 Broadway, New York, NY 10003-1202, USA

originalText.text:
The worst customer service ever. The lady would stay right behind our back like we are shop lifters and wouldn't say a word to us or even smile back. Her energy was really unpleasant . I don't understand how such a pretty store can have such a bad service.

Stuff needs to understand that this may be the only store location in the city, so a lot of customers who loves Fresh products are really looking forward visiting the store and are having some nice expectations and it's really sad to be greeted the way we were.

originalText.text: I always place my orders online but recently, I had the pleasure of placing my first order over the phone with Fresh, and my experience was outstanding. Talia, the representative I spoke with, was very professional, very attentive and addressed all my inquiries with patience. The package I received was beautifully wrapped along with some samples. I loved the product so much that I called her back this week and placed another order with her. Fresh skincare products are truly exceptional, and I've decided to only place my orders via phone, specifically requesting to speak with Talia. Thank you Fresh.

originalText.text: Recently I came here to buy a few gifts for Christmas and New Years, and one of the workers, Reana, went above and beyond to help me. She gave great knowledgeable advice on what to buy given the little information I had given her and also recommended a bunch of other products that went well with the ones I had already decided on purchasing. Her positive attitude and helpfulness definitely earns her a 10 outta 10 in customers service and actually made it enjoyable to shop (which is usually one of the most stressful things to do when buying gifts, for me at least). Would very much consider getting more products from here.

originalText.text: This is by far one of the best brands I’ve tried on: smells, moisture, texture, all of it. However, our experience with saleswoman Talia was out of this world: she was extra kind but not invasive and truly helpful, and I ended up buying five more products just because she was so lovely. I wanted to give my mom a gift to spoil her a bit because she had a tough year, and Talia did everything to prepare an extra nice package, so beautiful it was a shame to open it later. In the crazy NY rhythm, it was such a relief to meet a person so sweet and caring as her. It made our day so much better! Congrats to management for selecting her and giving her the space to shine!
